#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

/*bool isPrime(ll n){
	ll i,j;
	if(n==0||n==1)return false;
	if(n==2)return true;
	if(n%2==0)return false;
	for(i=3;i<=sqrt(n);i+=2)	
		if(!(n%i))
			return false;

	return true;
}

ll sievePrime(ll n){
	ll i,j,sum=0;
	ll *arr;

	arr = new ll[n+1];
	arr[0] = arr[1] = false;
	for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		arr[i]=1;

	for(i=2;i<=sqrt(n);i++)
		if(isPrime(i))
			for(j=i*i;j<=n;j+=i)
				arr[j]=false;		
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		if(arr[i])
			sum+=i;

	return sum;
}*/

ll factSum(ll n){
	ll sum =0;
	for(ll i=1;i<=n/2;i++)
		if(!(n%i))
			sum+=i;
	return sum;
}

int main(){
	ll t,n,i,temp;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		temp = factSum(n);
		if(factSum(temp)==n)cout<<"Yes, amicable with "<<temp<<endl;
		else cout<<"No\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
